title:
On the Hamiltonian structure of the intrinsic evolution of a closed
  vortex sheet
abstract:
Motivated by the work of previous authors on vortex sheets and their
applications, the inviscid evolution equations of a closed vortex sheet in a
plane, separating two piecewise constant density fluids, and their Hamiltonian
form are investigated. The model has potential applications to bubble dynamics.
A Poisson bracket is obtained containing the curve-tangential derivative. A
Lagrangian invariant of the sheet motion by its self-induced velocity--the
Cauchy principal value of the Biot-Savart integral--is derived.
